title: New: Bison Bonasus – If The Moon Did Not I Wouldn’t Either
content: Bison Bonasus remain shrouded in anonymity. The London based artist/band just released his/their debut single, the spell bounding If The Moon Did Not I Wouldn’t Either. With an epic intro hitting you like a shock wave that feels like a ’70s art-pop all-star jamming, Bison Bonasus explore the big orchestrated psychedelic pop latitude with an innocence and a playful heart. A dazzlingly stylish work that recalls Idiot Glee‘s artistic pop roots and leaves one with hopes that much greater things are upon us….
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d44
